title.en: Even With Cheats, Am I Still the Weakest in the Sect?!

description.en: All my senior and junior disciples are reincarnated powerhouses, while I’m just an ordinary guy from a small third-tier city who somehow got tricked by my master into being a sect's babysitter. Luckily, this sect is overflowing with buffs, and I managed to awaken the Favorability Index System—collecting profiles of powerhouses, earning favorability points, and using their abilities. Life just got way more fun!
description.zh: 我的师兄弟妹们全TM是转世大能，就我一个隔壁三线城市莫名其妙被师父坑蒙拐骗回来当保姆的普通人。还好，这个宗门buff太多，我还算幸运地觉醒了好感值图鉴系统——收集大能图鉴，获得好感值，使用大能的能力，爽歪歪！

description.en:
In a world where werewolves coexist with humans, Han Ji-woo, the only daughter of the werewolf clan leader, encounters the nation’s son, actor Cheon Yu-seung.

But… what on earth is this guy? Why does an ordinary celebrity make the power of wolves stronger?

title.en: When I Returned to My Hometown, My Childhood Friend was Broken

altTitles.ja-ro: Jimoto ni Kaettekitara Osananajimi ga Kowareteta

altTitles.ja: 地元に帰ってきたら幼馴染が壊れてた

altTitles.pt-br: Quando Voltei Para Minha Cidade Natal, Minha Amiga de Infância Estava Falida

altTitles.tr: Memleketime Döndüğümde Çocukluk Arkadaşım Paramparça Bir Durumdaydı

description.en:
When I was younger, one of my best friends was Kyouko. She was a brash and hotheaded young girl who, even though she was a tomboy, was still loved by her peers. 

To be honest, it’s been a few years since I came back home. The only person I know from there was Kyouko and she seems… different?
description.tr: Gençken en iyi arkadaşlarımdan biri Kyouko'ydu. Cesur ve atılgan bir genç kızdı; tomboy olmasına rağmen, arkadaşları tarafından seviliyordu. Dürüst olmak gerekirse, birkaç yıl sonra eve anca döndüm. Orada tanıdığım tek kişi Kyouko'ydu ve o sanki... biraz değişmişti?
description.pt-br:
Quando eu era mais jovem, uma das minhas melhores amigas era Kyouko. Ela era uma jovem impetuosa e cabeça quente que, embora fosse uma tomboy, ainda era amada por seus colegas.

Para ser sincero, já se passaram alguns anos desde que voltei para casa. A única pessoa que conheço de lá é Kyouko e ela parece... diferente?

altTitles.en: Becoming the Queen at the Age of Six

description.en: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the “background character that's doomed to die.” Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, I’ve got some serious challenges ahead of me. But I’m not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, I’ll do whatever it takes to survive!

"I'm going to live a normal life!"

Cho-eun, the heir to the underworld organization, Red Arrow Group, has finally entered university. She just wants to make lots of friends, but finds herself surrounded by four suspicious men.

"Are you an enemy? Or a friend? Or... do you like me?"

With a whirlwind of emotions—joy, anger, sorrow, and pleasure—engulfing her twenties as a freshman, will Cho-eun's dream of a normal campus life come true?

---
**Link:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11903391)
Yilin bumps into the tomboy Rouxi, sparking an interest between each other that slowly blooms.
description.pt-br: Yilin esbarra na tomboy Rouxi, despertando um interesse entre elas que floresce lentamente.

title.en: Kaifuku Jutsushi no Yarinaoshi ~Sokushi Mahou to Skill Copy no Chouetsu Heal~

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し～即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール～

altTitles.es-la: El Reinicio Como Sanador ~La Magia de Muerte Instantánea Con La Habilidad de Copiar La Curación Trascendental~

description.de: Keyaru wurde durch sein Unwissen immer und immer wieder ausgenutzt. Aber eines Tages erkannte er die wahre Macht der Heilmagie und kam zu der Überzeugung, dass ein Heiler die stärkste Klasse sei. Wie auch immer, ehe ihm das Potential eines Heilers klar wurde, war er bereits allem beraubt worden. Daher wandte er seine Heilmagie auf die Welt selbst an und reiste so 4 Jahre in der Zeit zurück. Er würde sich für alles rächen, was man ihm angetan hatte. Dies ist die kranke heldenhafte Geschichte eines Heilers, der der stärkste wurde, indem er sein Wissen über Heilung und seine Erfahrungen aus seinem vorherigen Leben kombiniert.
description.en:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."

Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others. But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.
description.it:
"I maghi curatori non possono combattere da soli." Keyaru, che era legato a questa conoscenza comune, fu sfruttato più e più volte dagli altri.  
Ma un giorno notò cosa c'era oltre la guarigione della magia e si convinse che il mago guaritore fosse la classe più forte. Tuttavia, quando ne realizzò il potenziale, fu privato di tutto. Così, usando la magia curativa sul mondo stesso, è tornato indietro di quattro anni, determinato a ricominciare tutto da capo.
description.ja: 【癒】の勇者ケヤルは、ある日【回復(ヒール)】が最強に至る魔法だと確信する。そして世界そのものを【回復】して四年前に戻り、自分の人生を弄んだ者たちへ復讐することを誓うのだった。
description.pl:
"Uzdrowiciele nie mogą walczyć w pojedynkę."  
Keare, który wiedział o tym aż za dobrze, był raz po raz wykorzystywany przez innych.  
Ale pewnego dnia odkrywa coś, co kryje się poza magią uzdrowienia, i zyskuje pewność, że uzdrowiciel to najpotężniejsza z klas maga. Jednakże zanim zdał sobie sprawę z jej potencjału, został już pozbawiony wszystkiego, co miał. Dlatego właśnie użył magii uzdrowienia na samym świecie, by cofnąć się w czasie o cztery lata, postanawiając, że zacznie wszystko od nowa.  
Oto heroiczna opowieść o pewnym uzdrowicielu, który stał się najsilniejszym dzięki wykorzystaniu wiedzy z dawnego życia i magii uzdrawiania.
description.pt-br:
"Magos de cura não podem lutar sozinhos." 

Keare, que estava vinculado por esse conhecimento comum, foi explorado uma vez ou outra pelos outros. Mas um dia, ele notou o que estava além da magia de cura e estava convencido de que um mago de cura era a classe mais forte. No entanto, quando percebeu esse potencial, ele estava privado de tudo. Assim, ele usou a magia de cura no próprio mundo para voltar quatro anos, decidindo refazer tudo. Este é um conto heroico de um mago de cura que se tornou o mais forte usando o conhecimento de sua vida passada e magia de cura.

title.en: Akagi: The Genius Who Fell Into Darkness

altTitles.ja: アカギ－闇に降り立った天才
闘牌伝説アカギ 闇に舞い降りた天才

description.en: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."

title.en: Shin no Jitsuryoku wa Girigiri Made Kakushite Iyou to Omou

altTitles.en: I Think I'll Hide My True Ability to the Last Moment

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Jitsuryoku wa Girigiri Made Kakushiteiyou to Omou

altTitles.ru: Я думаю скрывать свои истинные способности до последнего момента

altTitles.ja: 真の実力はギリギリまで隠していようと思う

altTitles.zh-hk: 我想將真正的實力隱藏到極限

altTitles.pt-br: Acho Que Vou Esconder Minha Verdadeira Habilidade Até O Último Momento

altTitles.fr: Je vais garder mes véritables capacités secrètes jusqu'à la dernière minute.

description.en:
A world where you can form a pact with gods and gain skills. Born as the third son of a famous knight family, Yuno was so busy controlling his innate power that he was eventually called "incompetent.".
However, in the magical knight academy, where he was enrolled for some reason, he fulfilled his fateful encounter with an unnamed god who was despised as "incompetent" like himself..  
Yuno, who formed a pact with the goddess and named her [Athena], secretly decided to make her the highest god, and decided to get a little more serious.
description.fr: Un monde où l'on peut conclure un pacte avec les dieux et acquérir des compétences. Troisième fils d'une célèbre famille de chevaliers, Yuno était tellement occupé à contrôler son pouvoir inné qu'il a fini par être qualifié d'"incompétent"... Cependant, à l'académie des chevaliers magiques, où il était inscrit pour une raison quelconque, il a fait la rencontre fatidique d'un dieu sans nom qui était méprisé pour son "incompétence"...  Yuno, qui a conclu un pacte avec la déesse et l'a nommée [Athéna], a secrètement décidé de faire d'elle le dieu suprême, et a décidé d'être un peu plus sérieuse.
description.id:
Dunia di mana kau dapat membuat kontrak dengan dewa dan memperoleh skill. Terlahir sebagai putra ketiga dari keluarga ksatria terkenal, Yuno begitu sibuk mengendalikan kekuatan bawaannya sehingga dia akhirnya disebut sebagai "tidak kompeten".  
Tapi, di akademi ksatria sihir, dia terdaftar karena suatu alasan, dia bertemu dengan dewa yang dipandang rendah sebagai "tidak kompeten" seperti dirinya ..  
Yuno, yang membuat kontrak dengan dewa dan menamainya [Athena], diam-diam memutuskan untuk menjadikannya dewa tertinggi, dan memutuskan untuk menjadi sedikit lebih serius.
description.pt-br: Um mundo onde você pode fazer um contrato com Deus e ganhar habilidades. Nascido como o terceiro filho de uma famosa família de cavaleiros, Yuno estava tão ocupado controlando seu poder inato que acabou sendo chamado de "incompetente".No entanto, na academia do cavaleiro mágico, que foi matriculado por algum motivo, ele cumpriu seu encontro fatídico com um deus sem nome que era desprezado como "incompetente" como ele.Yuno, que fez um contrato com a deusa e a chamou de [Athena], secretamente decidiu torná-la a deusa suprema e decidiu levar um pouco mais a sério seu destino.

title.en: A Gangster Became a High Schooler

description.en:
"My dream is to enter college."

Kim Deuk-pal, an uneducated man whose lifelong wish was to attend school, dies in a car accident while trying to save Song Yi-heon, a boy who jumped off an overpass while driving, on a rainy day.

'I hope that little thing lives.'

When Kim Deuk-pal wakes up and finds out that the real Song Yi-heon tried to kill him due to school bullying and outing, he decides to take revenge and goes to the high school of his dreams. However, Choi Se-kyung, Song Yi-heon's unrequited love, begins to suspect Song Yi-heon

"You're not Song Yi-heon."

Iona Modrov, known as the Emperor’s sword, hound, and secret lover, endures a harsh life as the illegitimate child of the Modrov family. Despite her sacrifices, she is forced into a political marriage and ultimately betrayed by the Emperor.

On the brink of death, the only one who comes to save her is her unwanted husband, Duke Leroy Han. In her final moments, she asks for a last kiss before dying—only to wake up in the past before everything went wrong.

Determined to change her fate, she runs to Leroy and boldly proposes:

“Duke, marry me. This time, I will make you happy!”
description.ko:
황제의 검, 황제의 개,황제의 숨겨진 애인으로 불리는기사 이오나 모드로프.

모드로프가의 사생아로 태어나혹독한 훈련과 가족들의 폭언과 폭력을 견뎌내고황제의 기사가 되었지만

이오나에게 돌아온 것은원하지 않는 상대와의 정략 결혼,그리고 황제의 배신뿐이었다.

“이오나, 정신 차려.”

황제의 배신으로 인해 죽음에 다달은 이오나를유일하게 구하러온 것은 정략 결혼으로 맺어진 이오나의 남편, 레로이 한 공작.

레로이에게 아무 감정도 없었던 이오나이지만삶의 마지막 순간, 레로이에게 부탁한다.

“키스해주십시오. 죽기 전 마지막 소원입니다.”
“그게 소원이라면…”

처음이자 마지막 입맞춤을 끝으로 죽게 된 이오나는레로이와 죽기 전 과거로 회귀한다.

그리고 이오나는 자신을 유일하게 구하러왔던 남편 레로이에게달려가 말했다.

“공작님, 저와 결혼해주십시오.제가 당신을 행복하게 만들어드리겠습니다!”


<이 결혼은 반드시 성공합니다>, 지금 시작합니다!

altTitles.ja: 忘却バッテリー

description.en:
Two geniuses who made a name for themselves in the middle school baseball world but had distanced themselves from baseball have serendipitously come together at an obsecure public high school in Tokyo.

Kiyomine Haruka, a pitcher with a flawless, powerful arm. His battery partner, the shrewd catcher known as the 'General', Kaname Kei (who's currently a complete amateur due to memory loss!). And then there are those who once fell in defeat to these two...

Their paths have crossed once more, and now their high school baseball story begins anew, springing into action!
description.ja:
中学球界で名を馳せるも野球から遠ざかっていた天才たちが都立の野球無名高校で偶然集結。

完全無欠の剛腕投手・清峰葉流火（きよみねはるか）。その相方（バッテリー）、切れ者捕手の“智将”要圭（記憶喪失により現在、素人！）。そして、かつて2人に敗れ散った者たち…

巡り合い、再び動き出す彼らの高校野球ストーリーがいま始まる!

altTitles.ja: ハイキュー!! - SWEET HAPPY SWEET (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Pairing: Kageyama x Hinata

Kageyama tricks Hinata into being his boyfriend. What follows is a series of cute moments between the two once Hinata realizes their feelings are actually mutual!

title.en: Houkago wa Kenka Saikyou no Gyaru ni Tsurekomareru Seikatsu Kanojo-tachi ni Sukarete, Boku mo Saikyou ni!?

altTitles.en: The Story of Being Taught How to Fight by a Delinquent Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 放課後はケンカ最強のギャルに連れこまれる生活　彼女たちに好かれて、僕も最強に⁉

description.en:
As a result of a combination of his good-natured personality and bad luck, Shiki Orifushi ends up enrolling in St. Lukeman's Academy, a school renowned for its delinquent students.

Before entering the school, Shiki had lived a life far removed from being a delinquent, but at St. Lukeman's, he was an herbivore thrown into a predator's cage.
Shiki was well aware of his situation, but his sense of justice and good-natured personality make him catch the attention of one of the school's numerous gangs of delinquents.

For the next year, Shiki was bullied by the delinquents and lived through hellish days, but one day, he almost bumped into the school's strongest delinquent gal, Karin Kohinata, in front of a vending machine. As a result of this, Shiki's school life changes completely.

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel Raw](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330648656085875)
description.ja:
**ジャンルに「学園」がない不具合**

お人好しな性格と不運が重なった結果、折節史季（おりふし　しき）は不良校として名高い聖ルキマンツ学園に入学するハメになってしまう。

学園に入学する以前は不良とは縁遠い生活を送っていた史季は、聖ルキマンツ学園においては肉食動物の檻に放り込まれた草食動物そのもの。
史季自身もそのことは重々に承知していたが、そこそこの正義感とそこそこ以上にお人好しな性格が災いとなり、校内に掃いて捨てるほどいる不良グループの一つに目をつけられてしまう。

それから一年もの間、史季は不良グループにいじめられ、地獄のような日々を送っていたが、ある日、学園最強のヤンキーギャル――小日向夏凛（こひなた　かりん）と自販機前でぶつかりそうになったことを契機に、史季の学園生活は一変することとなる。

altTitles.ja: 養護教諭の休日
ストチル

description.en: The story of three street children, Chamcham, Stella and Ozaki, seeking to change the world tied to adult rules.
description.es-la: Siguiendo la vida diaria de un par de chicas que no les gusta seguir las reglas

altTitles.ja: Isekai de Kekkon Soudansho Hajimemashita

altTitles.en: I Started a Dating Agency in a Different World

description.en: Mien Sotono, who works at a marriage counseling agency, is trying to protect a couple who have arranged a marriage and is hit by a car. And when she woke up, she found herself in a different world filled with values different from modern times!! Mien opens a marriage counseling agency in order to survive, but “marriage hunting” is extremely difficult in a world with different cultures and common sense. Is it in hard mode…!?

Kina, a witch doctor living on Mount Walpurgis, hears a prophecy from a titmouse one day that she will be executed within six months and will meet three men who will share her fate. Determined to escape her destiny, she hides in the mountains, but soon finds herself swept away by one man and sent to the imperial palace, where court intrigue awaits her. Can she survive the palace's plots and escape her foretold fate?

title.en: Is My Second Life a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

altTitles.en: My Second Life Is a  Healing Life?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

title.en: I'll Try to End the Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
I'm Going to Kill the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公を殺す筋書きを描いてみます

altTitles.vi: Tôi Sẽ Giết Chết Nam Chính

description.en:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
description.ko:
로판 소설을 읽고 몸이 아파오던 나 권진하.

여주인공 엘비가 느끼는 감정과 감각이 모두 연결되어버렸다.

끔찍한 통증과 슬픔에 병원까지 찾아갔지만 몸에는 이상무.

결국 소설 작가에게 메일을 보냈다.

제발 쓰레기 남주가 여주 좀 그만 괴롭히게.

하지만 메일을 보냈더니 사이다 답장은커녕….

“일은 똑바로 해야지, 엘비.”

소설 속 엘비에게로 빙의해버렸다.

빙의하자마자 뺨을 올려붙이는 남주를 보고 든 생각은 하나뿐.

남주? 죽여버리면 그만이지.

altTitles.ja: あずみ
少女杀手阿墨
百人斩少女

description.en:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Website](http://www.yu-koyama.com)  
- [Live-Action Movie on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6166)  
- [Live-Action Movie (sequel) on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6167)

title.ja: Kamiyama-san No Kamibukuro No Naka Ni wa

altTitles.ja: 紙山さんの紙袋の中には

altTitles.pt-br: O Que Há Debaixo da Sacola de Papel de Kamiyama-san?

description.en: On his very first day of starting high school, Namito Kominato's homeroom teacher has him sit behind a strange girl who wears a paper bag over her head and is always soaking wet with sweat. Her name is Samidare Kamiyama, a extremely shy girl with severe social anxiety. Ultimately, she meets Hinata Arai (the student council president who's kind and helpful, but alarmingly obsessed with her uniform) and Harusame Amano (a girl who only speaks to a cardboard cutout of a magical girl). These three unfortunate, but beautiful girls form a "conversation club", opening the curtain on this somewhat pitiful and comedic tale of adolescent romance!
description.id: Kominato Namito, seorang siswa SMA yang ingin menghabiskan waktu dengan tenang, untuk pertama kalinya di sekolah, tapi hari-hari yang tenang itu menjadi berantakan setelah dia bertemu dengan gadis aneh yang memakai kantong kertas dikepalanya
description.pt-br:
Em seu primeiro dia de aula no Ensino Médio, Kominato Namito, um estudante que deseja ter uma vida tranquila, se vê sentado atrás de uma garota glamorosa com uma sacola de papel na cabeça, suando de forma descomunal. Seu nome é Kamiyama-san. Para corrigir sua timidez e incapacidade de tirar a sacola de papel da cabeça, ele funda um clube chamado "Clube do Bate-Papo" com um grupo de lindas garotas, uma é a presidente Arai Yousuke, que é muito carinhosa, mas mostra uma obsessão incomum por uniformes, e Amano Harusame, que conversa com um painel de garota mágica 2D. 

Uma comédia romântica adolescente consideravelmente excêntrica começa!

altTitles.ja: 委員長とM子の百合

altTitles.en: Yuri Between the Class President and a Masochistic Girl
Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

altTitles.uk: Президентка Класу знайшла собі Слухняну Мазохістку

altTitles.tr: Sınıf başkanı ile mazoşist bir kız arasındaki yuri

altTitles.id: Kisah Bakung Antara Ketua Kelas dan Gadis Masokis

title.en: Sekai ni Hitori, Zenzokusei Mahou no Tsukaite

altTitles.ja: 世界に一人、全属性魔法の使い手

altTitles.en: The Only in the World, Omnipotent Wizard
The Only Person in the World Able to Use All Magic Attributes

description.en: After a traffic accident, Zenichi Kiyama, a humble office worker, was reincarnated as a baby in a different world called "perfect compatibility". However, the result of his attribute appraisal with crystal was "dark attribute". The worst result is that he is a demon child...! ?
description.id: Setelah kecelakaan lalu lintas, Zenichi Kiyama, seorang pekerja kantoran yang rendah hati, bereinkarnasi sebagai bayi di dunia berbeda yang disebut "kompatibilitas sempurna". Namun, hasil apresiasi atributnya dengan kristal adalah "atribut hitam". .! ?
description.ja: ブラック企業に勤めるサラリーマンの木山全一は交通事故を境に異世界に赤子として転生する。神様曰く、その世界は“相性バッチリ”とのこと。希望に満ちた異世界生活が始まるはずだったが、水晶による属性鑑定を行った結果、魔族の証である《闇属性》を持って産まれたことがわかってしまい…!?

title.en: The White Mage Who was Banished from the Hero's Party is Picked up by an S Rank Adventurer: This White Mage is Too Out of the Ordinary!

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーを追放された白魔導師、Sランク冒険者に拾われる ～この白魔導師が規格外すぎる～

altTitles.en: The White Mage Who was Banished from the Hero's Party is Picked up by an S Rank Adventurer: This White Mage is Too Out of the Ordinary!

altTitles.fr: La nouvelle vie du mage blanc

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihousareta Shiro Madoushi, S Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru ~Kono Shiro Madoushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru~

description.en: One day, Lloyd, a white mage, is banished from the hero’s party. Lloyd, who has lost his job, happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest by chance. At that time, no one knew that the hero’s party would collapse and Lloyd would gain fame - yet. This is the story of an extraordinary support magic-user who thinks he is normal, becomes an adventurer, while he is unaware of how he eventually becomes peerless.
description.ja: 「実力不足の白魔導師は要らない」　白魔導師であるロイドはある日、勇者パーティーを追放されてしまう。職を失ってしまったロイドだったが、たまたまSランクパーティーのクエストに同行することになる。この時はまだ、勇者パーティーが崩壊し、ロイドが名声を得ていくことを知る者はいなかった――。自分では普通だと思っているロイドは、無自覚に無双する！
description.pt-br: Um dia, Lloyd, um mago branco, é banido da festa do herói. Lloyd, que perdeu o emprego, por acaso acompanha um grupo de rank S em uma missão. Naquela época, ninguém sabia que o partido do herói entraria em colapso e Lloyd ganharia fama - ainda. Esta é a história de um extraordinário usuário de magia de suporte que pensa que é normal, torna-se um aventureiro, embora não saiba como eventualmente se torna incomparável.

altTitles.ja: もういっぽん!

altTitles.th: โมอิปปง! หนึ่งแต้มฝัน

description.en: After performing in their final middle school judo tournament, Michi and Sanae begin high school and walk in on Michi's final opponent fighting to save their new high school's judo club.

A world of constant war because we don't understand each other's differences.
A world where it is normal to hate and harm other species.
In this hellish world where blood is splashed and people kill and kill each other, how can a boy named Rito survive?
A medieval dark fantasy of humans and xenomorphs.
description.ko:
서로의 다름을 이해 못 해 끊임없는 전쟁이 벌어지는 세계.
타종을 혐오하고 해하는 것이 당연한 세계.
피가 튀고 서로가 죽고 죽이는
이 지옥 같은 세계에서 소년 '리토'는
과연 어떻게 살아남을 것인가.

인간과 이종족들이 벌이는 중세 다크 판타지

altTitles.ja: 黒の召喚士
The Berserker Rises to Greatness.

description.en:
"If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on!

Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! 
___
**Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
description.ru: Он очнулся в мире ничего не помня о себе, даже имени. Зато это мир меча и магии, а он призыватель. Ну, вперед, осваиваться в новом мире!
description.pt-br: As cortinas dessa história se abrem quando nosso protagonista troca suas memórias por um poder imensurável em um novo mundo. Agora, com o nome de Kelvin, ele precisa evoluir, dominar novos subordinados e se tornar o maior invocador de todos os tempos. Mas e então, até onde essa jornada vai nos levar?

title.en: Shitennou Sai Jakudatta Ore. Tensei Shitanode Heionna Seikatsu wo Nozomu

altTitles.ja: 四天王最弱だった俺。転生したので平穏な生活を望む

altTitles.ko: 사천왕 최약이었던 나, 전생했으므로 평온한 생활을 바란다

altTitles.en: I Was the Weakest of the Four Heavenly Kings. Since I Have Reincarnated, I Want to Lead a Peaceful Life

description.en:
Ranga was an ogre. However, he was also a strong ogre. Strong enough that he became one of the four most elite demons in the whole land. And, as with many other stories, his comrades betray him. Upon his death, he reincarnates as a normal human. Now, with all of the knowledge and strength of his former life, what do you think he’ll do with this new opportunity?

a) Live a peaceful life
b) Live a slow life
c) Do whatever he wants


---

**Links:**
- [Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9030ey)
description.ja: 勇者との戦いに敗れて命を落としてしまった魔軍四天王の一人、鬼王ランガ。しかし彼の魂は、前世の記憶を留めたまま人間に転生してしまう。せっかくただの人間に生まれたのだからと、今度は血生臭い戦いとは無縁の人生を送ろうと思っていたランガ。そんな彼の前に、前世で忠実な部下だった女吸血鬼・アーミラが現れる。さらには因縁の仇敵とも邂逅を果たしてしまい、ランガの新たな人生は再び激しく動き始めるのだった！

altTitles.ja: まじとら！

description.en:
Minami-kun spots a poster recruiting new members for the Magical Girl Club. Thinking "Cosplay cuties woohoo!" he decides to join… What the hell!? It's not cosplay, we actually become magical girls??  
  
A slice of life love-comedy revolving around magical girls and slippery slopes.
description.es:
Minami-kun ve un cartel para llamar la atención a aquellos interesados en unirse al Club de Chicas Mágicas. Pensando en "¡Ver chicas guapas en cosplay, yujuu!" decide entrar... ¿¡Pero qué demonios!? Esto no es un cosplay, ¿de verdad nos hemos transformado en chicas mágicas?

Una comedia romántica que gira en torno a las chicas mágicas y situaciones peligrosas.
description.ru:
Минами-кун заметил постер с приглашением в Клуб Девочек-Волшебниц. Подумав: «Ничоси, халявный косплей!», он решил присоединиться… Вот только он не знал, что это не косплей, а он сам станет Девочкой-волшебницей!  
  
  
Originally found on MinComi: <http://www.mincomi.jp/title/?title=327416>  
Twitter [@yutakashii](https://twitter.com/yutakashii)  
Pixiv: <http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=200861>  
<http://www.ebookjapan.jp/ebj/author/78088/>

altTitles.ja: ゲーセン少女と異文化交流

altTitles.ja-ro: Game Center Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu

altTitles.ja: Cultural Exchange With Game Center Girl

altTitles.en: Cultural Exchange With A Game Center Girl
Cross-Cultural Exchange With the Girl at the Arcade

altTitles.zh: 与游戏中心的少女异文化交流的故事

altTitles.zh-hk: 與遊戲中心的少女異文化交流的故事

altTitles.ja: ゲーセン少女

description.en: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

altTitles.ja: メメントゲーム

description.en:
Shinonome Yuuya, a failure at the prestigious Yuunagi Academy.
Hitsugi Akari, the top student of the year, is also a loner like him.
Despite being opposites in many ways, they share a certain similarity.
Suddenly, the two of them fall deep into the underground of the academy and get caught up in the games of the hidden world beneath Yuunagi Academy, Yomosugara Academy!!
In a school where an eternal night reigns, the games are played in pairs, and the rewards are the mysteries of this world and their own past memories!!
Will they be able to uncover the truth of this world—?
A survival game school suspense where “memory” and “trust” are the key!

(Source: Comic Walker, edited)
description.ja: エリート校の夕凪学園の落ちこぼれ・東雲夕夜。同じくぼっちでありながら、学年成績トップの日嗣アカリ。どこか似た者同士な二人は突如として、夕凪学園の裏側の世界・終夜学園のデスゲームに巻き込まれていく…!!

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

title.en: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong

altTitles.zh: 为了复活暗恋的师尊我被迫开了后宫

altTitles.zh-ro: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng

altTitles.en: I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

title.en: Gamer ga Isekai Konten Shite Harem Jinsei e Continue suru Sou desu

altTitles.ja: ゲーマーが異世界魂転してハーレム人生へコンティニューするそうです THE COMIC

altTitles.id: Sepertinya seorang gamer akan mengubah jiwanya ke dunia lain dan melanjutkan kehidupan harem

altTitles.en: A Gamer Is Going to Live a Harem Life in Another World

description.en:
After opening the last route of a certain FPS game, the protagonist jumps for joy, slips and dies. However, due to God - a game lover - feeling sorry for him, he decides to continue his life in a different world as the boy Wayne (although he seems to have no memory of his previous life). 

Life at military school in a world where magic and adventure are commonplace, and meeting heroines who truly love him.

This is the second life of a gamer down the harem route!?
description.id: Setelah membuka rute terakhir dari game FPS tertentu, si protagonis melompat kegirangan terpeleset dan mati.  Namun, karena Dewa (pencinta game) yang merasa kasihan padanya, ia memutuskan untuk melanjutkan hidupnya di dunia yang berbeda sebagai Wayne anak laki-laki (walaupun ia tampaknya tidak memiliki ingatan tentang kehidupan sebelumnya).  Kehidupan di sekolah militer di dunia di mana sihir dan petualangan adalah hal biasa, dan bertemu dengan para heroine yang benar-benar mencintainya. Ini adalah kehidupan kedua seorang gamer ke rute harem!?
description.ja:
いくどもコンティニューを繰り返し、
とあるFPSゲームの最後のルートを開放した主人公は、
喜びすぎが原因でその直後に頭をぶつけて死んでしまう。
しかし、それを不憫に思った神様（ゲーム好き）により、
彼は少年・ウェイン（ただし前世の記憶はない模様）として
異世界で人生を続けることに……。
魔法や冒険が当たり前の世界での軍学校生活、
そして自分を心から愛してくれるヒロインたちとの出会い。
ゲーマーの二度目の人生はハーレムルート一直線！？

title.en: Shinmai Necromancer, Maou wo Sosei suru

altTitles.en: The Novice Necromancer Who Resurrected the Demon King

altTitles.ja: 新米ネクロマンサー、魔王を蘇生する。

altTitles.id: Sang Nekromanser Pemula yang Membangkitkan Raja Iblis

description.en:
"O spirit destined to be mine, rise once more from the realm of the dead!"

In the depths of an extravagant tomb, Alice, a novice necromancer, channeled her mana into an ancient coffin as she cast her spell. Dust scattered through the air, and a wave of overwhelming mana surged, leaving her breathless. But what emerged was not the mindless undead she had expected—it was a handsome young man, casually perched atop the coffin, his piercing gaze meeting hers.

With a bright, disarming smile, he introduced himself—but Alice soon realized the truth: this was no ordinary man. He was the legendary figure who, centuries ago, had plunged the world into chaos and terror... the Demon King himself.

After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

Based on the 2019 movie "Nezha"  
  
Over a thousand years, spiritual energy of the earth and heavens merged to form a Chaos Pearl. Yuanshi Tianzun refined it into a Demon Pill and a Spirit Pearl.  
  
The Spirit Pearl, which was supposed to be reincarnated into Nezha's body, was stolen by Shen Gongbao and given to the East Dragon King. As such, the Third Prince Aobing, the reincarnation of the Spirit Pearl, was born. Surrounding Aobing is a series of events about growth, and a battle against the Dragons that is beginning.

altTitles.ja: 賢者の孫

altTitles.th: หลานจอมปราชญ์

altTitles.vi: Cháu trai của nhà thông thái

description.en:
Thanks to various magic, the human race has been saved from calamity many, many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life, a boy, Shin, was picked up by an old man known to the world as the "Magi." Shin was brought up by the Magi, who had retired to a secular place, as his own grandson. With the memories of his past life, he absorbed the Magi's craft and grew to be able to develop his own magic. Then, the grandfather told him he has to become independent when he reaches the age of 15.

"Ah, I forgot to teach him common sense."

The grandson who has grown beyond the level of normal people, lacked common sense; the common sense of the world. So to learn how to socialize, he goes to Earlshide Kingdom City to be admitted to Earlshide Advanced Magic Academy.
description.ja: 事故で死んだはずの青年が、赤ん坊の姿で異世界に転生。そして救国の英雄「賢者」マーリン・ウォルフォードに拾われた彼は、シンと名付けられる。孫として育てられたシンはマーリンから魔法を教わるが、その習得速度は驚くべきもので、メキメキと力をつけていく。一方、山奥で世間から隔離されて育った弊害として、シンには一つ致命的な問題があった…。そう、シンが１５歳となった時に祖父・マーリンは言ったのだ――「常識を教えるの忘れとった」！　かくして常識と友達を得るためアールスハイド高等魔法学院に入学するシンだったが――。

title.en: Dorei Shounin shika Sentakushi ga Nai desu yo? Harem? Nani Sore Oishii no?

altTitles.ja: Dorei Shounin Shika Sentakushi Ga Nai desu Yo? ~Harem? Nani sore oishii no?~

altTitles.en: Is The Only Option a Slave Merchant? ~ Harem? What is that, Is it tasty? ~

altTitles.ja: 奴隷商人しか選択肢がないですよ?～ハーレム?なにそれおいしいの?～

description.en:
Zeolith wanted a chill life, but when he turned 15 his villages rule was that they had to go to the vocational school "Velciel" where each student will choose their profession. Zeolith wanted an easy job where he could laze around all day, but the only options he got were : "The Highest Peak of the Human Race【Hero】", "The Strongest Ruler 【Demon Emperor】", "The Title of the Strongest Magician 【Great Sage】", "And the last one "The Lowest Title, a Job For Scum【Slave Merchant】". 

None of the titles were a good option. He picked the lowest title 【Slave Merchant】, which is inconspicuous among them and seems to be easy to live. But, He doesn't know it yet. 

It's the lowest occupation but it is the strongest for him and the most annoying-tiring ones. A harem struggle to be swayed by a variety of women, slutty alluring girls from elderly to younger ones who are his childhood friend's, the poisonous plantgirl, elves, cat ears adventurer, Loli Demon Lord, et cetera.  
  
This is Tale of The strongest【Slave Merchant】unwillingly makes a big success!
description.id:
Zeoris menginginkan kehidupan yang santai, tetapi ketika dia berusia 15 tahun, aturan desanya adalah bahwa mereka harus pergi ke sekolah keahlian “Velciel” di mana setiap siswa akan memilih profesi mereka. Zeoris menginginkan pekerjaan yang mudah di mana dia bisa bermalas-malasan sepanjang hari, tetapi satu-satunya pilihan yang dia dapatkan adalah: “Puncak Tertinggi dari Ras Manusia 【HERO】”, “Penguasa Terkuat 【Demon Emperor】”, “Gelar yang Terkuat Penyihir 【Great Sage】 “,” Dan yang terakhir “Tittle Terendah, Pekerjaan Untuk Sampah 【Slave Merchant】”. Tidak ada gelar yang merupakan pilihan bagus. Dia memilih gelar terendah 【Slave Merchant】, yang tidak mencolok di antara mereka dan tampaknya mudah untuk hidup.  
  
Tapi, dia belum mengetahuinya. Itu adalah pekerjaan paling rendah tetapi itu yang terkuat baginya dan yang paling melelahkan. Perjuangan harem untuk diombang-ambingkan oleh berbagai wanita, gadis cantik yang memikat dari tua hingga yang lebih muda yang merupakan teman masa kecilnya, gadis tumbuhan beracun, elf, petualang telinga kucing, Loli Demon Lord, dan lain-lain.  
  
Ini adalah Dongeng Terkuat 【Slave Merchant】 yang enggan membuat sukses besar!

altTitles.ja: レジスター

description.en: How young is too young to fall in love? How old is too old to fall in love? Who decides the end of the flowery days of youth and the beginning of the same? In the eastern part of Tokyo, at a supermarket in a town zero meters above sea level. A chance encounter for two people over the cashier's counter. A youth-returning story where something might start!
description.ja:
いくつまで恋が出来るのか。
いくつから恋が出来るのか。
青春の終わりを、始まりを、誰が決めるのか。
東京東部、
海抜ゼロメートルの町のスーパーマーケット。
レジカウンター越しの二人。
何かが始まるかもしれない青春リターナブル・ストーリー！
description.zh: 什么时候开始恋爱才好、什么时候结束恋爱才好。青春的序幕与尾曲又是什么人决定的呢？在东京的某处小商街里，有个恋爱故事在超市的收银台边拉开了序幕

title.en: Bouken ni iku Fuku ga Nai!

altTitles.ja: 冒険に行く服がない!

altTitles.en: I have no clothes to go on an adventure!

description.en: A certain village was attacked by a monster army and fell into a dire situation. At that moment, the strongest hero, Eric, appeared and instantly mowed down the enemies. However, due to his overwhelming strength, his equipment couldn’t withstand the battle, and he was cursed with the tragic fate of becoming naked after every fight...!? A liberating adventure craft comedy begins now!

Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

altTitles.ja: 堀さんと宮村くん
堀桑与宫村君

description.en:
The original story which the popular manga series Horimiya is based on.  
  
It's said that youth is bittersweet, but maybe it's just bitter? Kyoko Hori is a flashy high school girl, who, despite her ostentatious appearance, excels in academics and loves her family. Izumi Miyamura is a bland high school boy, who, regardless of not wanting to stand out in class, secretly wears piercings outside of school and has a large body tattoo. One day, Miyamura finds Hori's little brother injured and helps him back to Hori's house, where the relationship between Hori and Miyamura begins with Hori's discovery of Miyamura's secret, and his of her's.  
  


---
description.ru:
В школе Хори-сан – пример для всех – красивая, дружелюбная девушка с высокой успеваемостью, но это лишь одна её сторона, другую – она тщательно скрывает. Её родителей-трудоголиков часто не бывает дома, так что Хори вынуждена всё своё свободное время посвящать домашним делам и присмотру за младшим братом.  
Миямура-кун кажется одноклассникам мрачным отаку в очках, однако на самом деле он очень вежливый и спокойный человек, и ему трудно даётся учёба. Миямура не любит выделяться, так что усердно скрывает, что у него есть пирсинг и татуировки.  
Однажды случай сводит их вместе за пределами школы. Хори едва узнаёт в нём своего одноклассника, а Миямура поражён тем, насколько она отличается от того образа, что поддерживает в школе. Теперь им двоим есть с кем поделиться своими тайнами и раскрыть настоящих себя.  
  


---

Chapters 1 - 140 are the main story.  
Chapters 141 onwards are extras.

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活　第五章　水の都と英雄の詩

altTitles.ja-ro: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai-5 Shou - Mizu no Machi to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero — Começando uma Vida em Outro Mundo — Arco 5: A Metrópole da Água e o Poema do Herói

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

altTitles.es-la: Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe.

description.en:
The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.

Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella, the city of the watergates.
description.ja:
悪意が蠢く水門都市へ、集え歴戦の英雄たち。

『聖域』での戦いから一年、平穏な日々を送るナツキ・スバルだったが、王選候補者の一人、アナスタシアの招待により、一行は水門都市プリステラへと出発した。水の都で懐かしい面々と旧交を温めるスバル達。しかし、その裏では悪意が蠢いていて――。
description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: クレイマン Revenge

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Clayman's Revenge

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Месть Клеймана

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسد فيه كسلايم: انتقام كلايمان

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en: Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?
description.ja: ワルプルギスに響き渡った断末魔。道化の夢は一度は尽きたかと思われた。しかし運命のイタズラか、世界の選択か、死んだはずのクレイマンは復活し、再び暗躍を始め･･･る？
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed...
description.ja: 離島「花山島」に東京からやってきた女子高生、千堂千尋。独自の風俗が残るその島で、人の欲望が暴走する事件が起き始める。殺人、放火、強姦…‥際限ない欲望が離島を地獄に変えていく――。

description.en:
I, Leticia Violet, was devoted to my husband, but I lost everything. Just as she is about to lose her life, a man appears in her life. He promises to help me achieve the perfect revenge...

"When you say you'll help me get my revenge... please honor your word."

To those who brought me to my death, I will give back all that I have received.

---
When Letitia Winchester faces death at the hands of her husband’s mistress, fate intervenes. She’s fished out of the river by Prince Sion, the first “Sol” born in a holy empire in 300 years. Using his divine powers, he changes Letitia’s appearance and gives her the new identity of Countess Anarose Victoire. Armed with divine powers and a thirst for revenge, the two form an unlikely alliance. Prince Sion seeks justice for a fallen friend, while Letitia plots retribution against those who wronged her.

Together, they embark on a journey of vengeance and redemption.
